replies.body: The weekend before final exams. GG.
The weekend after for me.  Goodbye life, hello Rift.
Relationship between GPA and IP is inversely proportional.
omfg my life said in 1 sentence you god.
#FirstWorldProblems
welp im gonna be a senior again no graduating for me this year
GEE GEE IM NOT ADVANCING A GRADE
Life is rift.
Correction : Rift is life.
I didn't choose the Rift life, Rift life chose me
The weekend of Prom also, looks like I'm gaining IP!
lol me and my prom date are playing the shit outa league before and after:P
Hold on to that one (s)he's a keeper. ;)
You and your hand must be very close
Prepare for your exams. Succeed your school. Get a good job. Become billionaire. Buy RP. And gift me SKT T1 Jax{{champion:24}}
if you get an IP boost, do we get double double ip???
Quadruple IP.... Well, I did need to start saving up for Ang- I mean Braum.
good thing mine are in 3 weeks LOL
I was so excited about this IP'd everywhere. ;)
{{champion:19}} Bad dog.
Well damn, I have a date both those days. Man thanks a lot but good thing is. My gf is a gamer so meh..
Girls are important, too.

holy crap do they reall  lol, like 450 ip per match. OMG ip weekend boost RP bought IP boost with a daily win o_O
